original_text: When he had drunk a lot of wine, he spoke to his servants. He commanded them to bring the valuable gold and silver cups, so that the people could drink from them. His father, King Nebuchadnezzar, had taken those cups from God's temple in Jerusalem. King Belshazzar wanted to drink from them, as well as his important friends, his wives and his other women.
korean_text: 벨사살이 술을 마실 때에 명하여 그의 부친 느부갓네살이 예루살렘 성전에서 탈취하여 온 금, 은 그릇을 가져오라고 명하였으니 이는 왕과 귀족들과 왕후들과 후궁들이 다 그것으로 마시려 함이었더라

sentences.original_text: When he had drunk a lot of wine
to bring the valuable gold and silver cups
so that the people could drink from them
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그 잔들로 마실 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: had taken those cups from God's temple in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘에 있는 하나님의 성전에서 그 잔들을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: King Belshazzar wanted to drink from them
sentences.korean_translation: 벨사살 왕은 그 잔들로 마시고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as his important friends
his wives and his other women
